content.question: Which of the following best describes the main claim made by von Staupitz in the passage?

choices.label: Church authorities are the best judges of whether someone is truly repentant.
The collection of money for the forgiveness of sins has corrupted the church.
Forgiveness of sins depends on repentance, not on a monetary payment.
Bishops, rather than the pope, should have the power to forgive sins.

content.answer: Forgiveness of sins depends on repentance, not on a monetary payment.
